entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 7 April 2023
